action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Paris
TO: Dresden
BY: Taxi
CLASS: First
WHEN: At the end of next week

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: Ok.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  Does the travel agent already know your origin? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: No.<|end_of_text|>
action.label: forget

action.content: no
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: No, the travel agent is not aware of my destination yet.<|end_of_text|>
action.label: forget

action.content: no
Answer for TO valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.

action.label: forget

action.content: no

action.label: forget

action.content: no

ME:  Have you informed the travel agent about your dates? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

action.content: ASIDE: No, I haven't informed the travel agent about my dates yet.<|end_of_text|>
action.label: forget

action.content: no
Answer for WHEN valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.

action.content:

ASIDE: I'm traveling from Paris to Dresden by taxi in first class at the end of next week.<|end_of_text|>
